attributes.action: Defer Croatian immigration into the UK on 01 July 2013 for 5 years.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is already suffering under the Government Austerity programme which is scheduled for several more years.

More immigrants from Croatia to the UK will create much more pressure on the country's Services which are already under pressure and struggling to operate at a decent standard.

The NHS, Hospitals, Housing,Schools and Education as well as Employment opportunities are under threat of collapsing already.

Our nations infrastructure is being shaken with the weight it carries each day.

Will the Government please defer entry of Croatia into the UK for 5 years, until 01 July 2018?

.
